dct_description_sm: Triangulation by C. Rockwell Assist. ; Topography by C. Rockwell and J.J. Gilbert Assist. ; Hydrography by J.J. Gilbert ; Issued, in June 1878 C.P. Patterson Superintendent ; Verified J.E. Hilgard ; Outlines Hydrography and lettering by H.M. Knight & W.A. Thompson ; Topography...W.A. Thompson ; reduced drawing of Topography...H. Lindenkohl; reduced drawing of Hydrography...E.Hergesheimer.
Depths shown by soundings and gradient shading (in low water areas); relief by contours and spot heights
Bar scales in yards, statute miles, nautical miles, kilometers
Tidal information; buoy legend; notes on elevations and soundings
Shows drainage, vegetation, topography, low water areas, islands, buildings, divisions of land
At head of title is U.S. Coast Survey seal
